TypeSignature.Value: public class Tuple<T1,T2,T3,T4> : IComparable, System.Collections.IStructuralComparable, System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable

.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Tuple`4<T1, T2, T3, T4> extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IStructuralComparable, class System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable, class System.IComparable
Public Class Tuple(Of T1, T2, T3, T4) Implements IComparable, IStructuralComparable, IStructuralEquatable
generic <typename T1, typename T2, typename T3, typename T4> public ref class Tuple : IComparable, System::Collections::IStructuralComparable, System::Collections::IStructuralEquatable
type Tuple<'T1, 'T2, 'T3, 'T4> = class interface IStructuralEquatable interface IStructuralComparable interface IComparable

typeparam.name: T1
typeparam.span: Tuple 第 1 個元件的型別。

span.span: The type of the tuple's first component.

typeparam.name: T2
typeparam.span: Tuple 第 2 個元件的型別。

span.span: The type of the tuple's second component.

typeparam.name: T3
typeparam.span: Tuple 第 3 個元件的型別。

span.span: The type of the tuple's third component.

typeparam.name: T4
typeparam.span: Tuple 第 4 個元件的型別。

span.span: The type of the tuple's fourth component.
Represents a 4-tuple, or quadruple.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Tuple 是具有特定的數字和值序列的資料結構。A tuple is a data structure that has a specific number and sequence of values. 類別代表 4-tuple 或四，也就是有四個元件的元組。The class represents a 4-tuple, or quadruple, which is a tuple that has four components. 您可以具現化藉由呼叫物件建構函式或靜態方法。You can instantiate a object by calling either the constructor or the static method. 您可以擷取的值元組的元件所使用的唯讀， ， ，和執行個體屬性。You can retrieve the value of the tuple's components by using the read-only , , , and instance properties. Tuple 常用於四種不同方式：Tuples are commonly used in four different ways: - 為了表示單一的資料集。To represent a single set of data. 比方說，tuple 可以代表資料庫記錄，和其元件可代表記錄的個別欄位。For example, a tuple can represent a database record, and its components can represent individual fields of the record. - 若要提供讓您輕鬆存取，以及操作資料集。To provide easy access to, and manipulation of, a data set. 下列範例會定義各種物件，其中包含棒球 pitchers、 它們音調，球的數目和盈餘分析執行 （而不需要解答錯誤計分的執行），數的名稱，並叫用它們放棄。The following example defines an array of objects that contain the names of baseball pitchers, the number of innings they pitched, and the number of earned runs (runs that scored without fielding errors), and hits that they gave up. 陣列傳遞至`ComputeStatistics`方法，它會計算每個投手盈餘分析執行平均值 （執行中、 包含九部 inning 遊戲才放棄的平均數目），以及每 inning 才放棄的叫用的平均數目。The array is passed to the `ComputeStatistics` method, which calculates each pitcher's earned run average (the average number of runs given up in a nine-inning game), and the average number of hits given up per inning. 方法也會使用這些兩個的平均值來計算假設性的效益平均。The method also uses these two averages to compute a hypothetical effectiveness average. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`4.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`4.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.class/vb/example1.vb#1)] - 若要傳回多個值的方法，而不使用來自`out`參數 （在 C#) 或`ByRef`參數 （在 Visual Basic)。To return multiple values from a method without the use of `out` parameters (in C#) or `ByRef` parameters (in Visual Basic). 比方說前, 一個範例會傳回其計算的統計資料，以及在投手，名稱中的陣列物件。For example, the previous example returns its computed statistics, along with the name of the pitcher, in an array of objects. - 若要將多個值傳遞至方法，以透過單一參數。To pass multiple values to a method through a single parameter. 比方說，方法具有單一參數，可讓您提供一個值的執行緒在啟動時執行的方法。For example, the method has a single parameter that lets you supply one value to the method that the thread executes at startup. 如果您提供物件做為方法引數中，您可以提供資料的四個項目使用的執行緒啟動常式。If you supply a object as the method argument, you can supply the thread’s startup routine with four items of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您也可以使用靜態的 4 tuple 物件的具現化，而不需要明確指定其元件類型的方法。You can also use the static method to instantiate a 4-tuple object without having to explicitly specify the types of its components. 下列範例會使用方法具現化其元件是類型 4 個 tuple ， ， ，和。The following example uses the method to instantiate a 4-tuple whose components are of type , , , and . [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Create#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/cs/create1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Create#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/vb/create1.vb#7)] 這相當於下列呼叫來類別建構函式。This is equivalent to the following call to the class constructor. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Create#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/cs/create1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Create#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/vb/create1.vb#8)]

Public Overrides Function Equals (obj As Object) As Boolean

param.name: obj
param.span: 與這個執行個體相互比較的物件。

span.span: The object to compare with this instance.

summary.span: 傳回值，這個值表示目前的 物件是否等於指定的物件。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the current object is equal to a specified object.

returns.span: 如果目前的執行個體和指定的物件相等，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current instance is equal to the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `obj`參數會被視為等於目前的執行個體，在下列情況下：The `obj` parameter is considered to be equal to the current instance under the following conditions: - 它是物件。It is a object. - 其四個元件是與目前的執行個體相同的類型。Its four components are of the same types as the current instance. - 其四個元件的目前執行個體相等。Its four components are equal to those of the current instance. 是否相等由每個元件的預設物件相等比較子決定。Equality is determined by the default object equality comparer for each component. ## Examples 下列範例會定義各種溫度提供的資料，在特定一天的三個時間的物件。The following example defines an array of objects that provide data on temperatures at three times during a particular day. 呼叫方法來比較每個物件與每個其他物件。The method is called to compare every object with every other object. 輸出說明了方法會傳回`true`只有當所有的四個元件的物件具有相等值。The output illustrates that the method returns `true` only when all four components of the objects have equal values. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`4.Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.equals/cs/equals1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`4.Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.equals/vb/equals1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得目前 物件之第一個元件的值。

span.span: Gets the value of the current object's first component.

value.span: 目前 物件之第一個元件的值。

span.span: The value of the current object's first component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以動態決定的型別元件有兩種：You can dynamically determine the type of the component in one of two ways: - 藉由呼叫`GetType`方法所傳回的值屬性。By calling the `GetType` method on the value that is returned by the property. - 藉由擷取物件，表示物件，並擷取第一個項目所傳回的陣列從其方法。By retrieving the object that represents the object, and retrieving the first element from the array that is returned by its method. ## Examples 下列範例會定義各種其元件包含城市名稱、 年份和平均的高低溫度的月份當月的物件。The following example defines an array of objects whose components contain the name of a city, a month of the year, and the average high and low temperatures for that month. 然後，它會擷取並顯示每個元件的值。It then retrieves and displays the value of each component. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`4.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.item1/cs/item1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`4.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.item1/vb/item1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 System.Collections.IStructuralComparable.CompareTo(object other, class System.Collections.IComparer comparer) cil managed
Function CompareTo (other As Object, comparer As IComparer) As Integer Implements IStructuralComparable.CompareTo

param.name: other
param.span: 要與目前執行個體比較的物件。

span.span: An object to compare with the current instance.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 提供自訂規則進行比較的物件。

span.span: An object that provides custom rules for comparison.

summary.span: 使用指定的比較子將目前的 物件和指定的物件進行比較，並且傳回一個整數，表示目前的物件在排序順序中位於指定之物件的前面、後面還是相的位置。

span.span: Compares the current object to a specified object by using a specified comparer and returns an integer that indicates whether the current object is before, after, or in the same position as the specified object in the sort order.

returns.span: 帶正負號的整數，可指出此執行個體以及排序次序中 的相對位置，如下表所示。

span.span: A signed integer that indicates the relative position of this instance and in the sort order, as shown in the following table.
Value
Description
A negative integer

description.span: 這個執行個體位於 之前。

span.span: This instance precedes .
Zero

description.span: 這個執行個體和 的排序位置相同。

span.span: This instance and have the same position in the sort order.
A positive integer

description.span: 這個執行個體位於 之後。

span.span: This instance follows .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 雖然可以直接呼叫這個方法，它最常由呼叫集合排序方法，包括參數來排序集合的成員。Although this method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by collection sorting methods that include parameters to order the members of a collection. 比方說，它由呼叫方法和方法具現化所使用的物件建構函式。For example, it is called by the method and the method of a object that is instantiated by using the constructor. > [!CAUTION] > 方法是用於排序作業。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 此外，它不應該使用時比較的主要目的是要判斷兩個物件是否相等。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要判斷兩個物件是否相等，請呼叫方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. ## Examples 下列範例會建立陣列包含棒球 pitchers 相關的統計資料的物件。The following example creates an array of objects that contain statistical data about baseball pitchers. 資料的項目包含在投手的名稱，音調的球數，在投手盈餘分析執行平均 （投手可讓每個遊戲的回合的平均數目），並在投手已放棄的叫用次數。The data items include the name of the pitcher, the number of innings pitched, the pitcher's earned run average (the average number of runs a pitcher allows per game), and the number of hits the pitcher has given up. 此範例顯示未排序的順序陣列中的每個 tuple 的元件、 排序的陣列，接著再呼叫來顯示每個 tuple 的值以排序順序。The example displays the component of each tuple in the array in unsorted order, sorts the array, and then calls to display the value of each tuple in sorted order. 若要排序的陣列，此範例會定義泛型`PitcherComparer`類別可實作介面和排序其第三個元件 （盈餘分析執行平均） 的值依遞增順序排列，而不是其第一個物件元件。To sort the array, the example defines a generic `PitcherComparer` class that implements the interface and sorts the objects in ascending order by the value of their third component (the earned run average) rather than their first component. 請注意，此範例不會直接呼叫方法。Note that the example does not directly call the method. 來隱含地呼叫這個方法每個項目陣列中的方法。This method is called implicitly by the method for each element in the array. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`4.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.compareto/cs/compareto2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`4.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.compareto/vb/compareto2.vb#2)]

span.span: is not a object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable.Equals(object other, class System.Collections.IEqualityComparer comparer) cil managed
Function Equals (other As Object, comparer As IEqualityComparer) As Boolean Implements IStructuralEquatable.Equals

param.name: other
param.span: 與這個執行個體相互比較的物件。

span.span: The object to compare with this instance.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 物件，定義要用來評估這兩個物件是否相等的方法。

span.span: An object that defines the method to use to evaluate whether the two objects are equal.

summary.span: 傳回值，這個值表示依據指定的比較方法，目前的 物件是否等於指定的物件。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the current object is equal to a specified object based on a specified comparison method.

returns.span: 如果目前的執行個體和指定的物件相等，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current instance is equal to the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 實作稱為 「 只有當`other`不是`null`，如果它可以是 成功地轉型 （在 C#) 或 （在 Visual Basic) 轉換成其元件是與目前的執行個體的相同類型的物件。The implementation is called only if `other` is not `null`, and if it can be successfully cast (in C#) or converted (in Visual Basic) to a object whose components are of the same types as the current instance. 方法的第一個階段的值要比較的物件實作。The method first passes the values of the objects to be compared to the implementation. 如果這個方法呼叫傳回`true`，方法是呼叫一次，並傳遞兩個物件。If this method call returns `true`, the method is called again and passed the values of the two objects. 如果這個方法呼叫傳回`true`同樣地，呼叫該方法第三次，並傳遞兩個物件。If this method call returns `true` again, the method is called a third time and passed the values of the two objects. 如果這個方法呼叫傳回`true`同樣地，第四個和最後一次呼叫方法，傳遞兩個物件。If this method call returns `true` again, the method is called for the fourth and final time and passed the values of the two objects. ## Examples 下列範例會定義`Item3And4Comparer`類別可實作介面，並變更的方式評估物件是否相等。The following example defines an `Item3And4Comparer` class that implements the interface and changes the way in which objects are evaluated for equality. 此方法一律會傳回`true`傳遞時並兩個屬性值物件，它會呼叫`obj.Equals`方法，評估其屬性值。The method always returns `true` when it is passed the and property values of two objects, and it calls the `obj.Equals` method to evaluate their property values. 就這個方法呼叫會傳回 true，它也會呼叫`obj.Equals`方法，評估的 tuple屬性值。It this method call returns true, it also calls the `obj.Equals` method to evaluate the tuples' property values. 如此一來，方法會測試是否相等的值僅為基礎和屬性。As a result, the method tests for equality based only on the values of the and properties. 輸出示範資料集的結果記錄美國城市名稱，該月的月份的年份和平均的高低溫度的物件。The output illustrates the result for a data set of objects that record the name of a U.S. city, the month of a year, and the average high and low temperature for that month. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`4.Equals#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.equals/cs/equals2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`4.Equals#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.equals/vb/equals2.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable.GetHashCode(class System.Collections.IEqualityComparer comparer) cil managed
Function GetHashCode (comparer As IEqualityComparer) As Integer Implements IStructuralEquatable.GetHashCode

param.name: comparer
param.span: 其 方法可以計算目前 物件之雜湊碼的物件。

span.span: An object whose method calculates the hash code of the current object.

summary.span: 使用指定的計算方法，計算目前 物件的雜湊碼。

span.span: Calculates the hash code for the current object by using a specified computation method.

returns.span: 32 位元帶正負號的整數雜湊碼。

span.span: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 此方法只會包裝對`comparer`物件的實作。The method simply wraps a call to the `comparer` object's implementation. 用來計算雜湊碼的演算法應該傳回相同的雜湊程式碼的兩個會被視為相等的物件。The algorithm used to compute the hash code should return the same hash code for two objects that are considered to be equal.

Function CompareTo (obj As Object) As Integer Implements IComparable.CompareTo

param.name: obj

span.span: Compares the current object to a specified object and returns an integer that indicates whether the current object is before, after, or in the same position as the specified object in the sort order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 這個方法會提供實作類別。This method provides the implementation for the class. 雖然可以直接呼叫這個方法，它最常由呼叫例如排序方法，集合的預設多載和，來排序集合的成員。Although the method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by the default overloads of collection sorting methods, such as and , to order the members of a collection. > [!CAUTION] > 方法是用於排序作業。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 此外，它不應該使用時比較的主要目的是要判斷兩個物件是否相等。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要判斷兩個物件是否相等，請呼叫方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. 方法會使用預設物件的比較子來比較每個元件。The method uses the default object comparer to compare each component. ## Examples 下列範例會建立陣列棒球投手的名稱、 音調，球的數目和的點擊和才放棄的盈餘分析執行的數字組成其元件的物件。The following example creates an array of objects whose components consist of a baseball pitcher's name, number of innings pitched, and number of hits and earned runs given up. 它會顯示未排序的順序陣列中的每個 tuple 的元件、 排序的陣列，然後呼叫以排序的順序顯示每個 tuple。It displays the components of each tuple in the array in unsorted order, sorts the array, and then calls to display each tuple in sorted order. 輸出會顯示名稱，也就是第一個元件已經排序陣列。The output shows that the array has been sorted by name, which is the first component. 請注意，此範例不會直接呼叫方法。Note that the example does not directly call the method. 來隱含地呼叫這個方法每個項目陣列中的方法。This method is called implicitly by the method for each element in the array. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`4.CompareTo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.compareto/cs/compareto1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`4.CompareTo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.compareto/vb/compareto1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所傳回的字串形式 (*Item1*， *Item2*， *Item3*， *Item4*)，其中*Item1*， *Item2*， *Item3*，和*Item4*代表的值， ， ，與屬性，分別。The string returned by this method takes the form (*Item1*, *Item2*, *Item3*, *Item4*), where *Item1*, *Item2*, *Item3*, and *Item4* represent the values of the , , , and properties, respectively. 如果有任何屬性值是`null`，表示為。If any of the property values is `null`, it is represented as . ## Examples 下列範例說明方法。The following example illustrates the method. 它會顯示包含城市名稱、 年份和最高和最低平均溫度的月份當月的 4 tuple 物件的陣列的元件。It displays the components of an array of 4-tuple objects that contain the name of a city, a month of the year, and the high and low average temperature for that month. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`4.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.tostring/cs/tostring1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`4.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.tostring/vb/tostring1.vb#1)]
